name: Philo-dev
tagline: Machine-corrected versions of the works of Philo Judaeus, the Hellenistic Jewish philosopher.
body:
#Welcome to philo-dev!

##About
This repository hosts digital versions of public-domain editions of the works of Philo Judaeus, the Hellenistic Jewish philosopher.

The XML files were produced by data entry company [Digital Divide Data](http://www.digitaldividedata.org/) (DDD), who OCR'd, corrected and encoded each print volume in accordance with the latest [EpiDoc](http://sourceforge.net/p/epidoc/wiki/Home/) standards. While adequate, more can and should be done to improve the XML (the -dev(elopment) suffix indicates the repository is open to improvement).

##Contents
* Philonis Alexandrini Opera quae supersunt. [Vol. 1](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/philo-dev/blob/master/philo_1.xml): _De Opificio Mundi_, _Legum Allegoriarum Lib. I-III_, _De Cherubim_, _De Sacrificiis Abelis et Caini_, _Quod Deterius Potiori Insidiari Soleat_ (1896) Ed. Leopold Cohn & Paul Wendland. Berlin: Berolini Reimer.
* Philonis Alexandrini Opera quae supersunt. [Vol. 4](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/philo-dev/blob/master/philo_4.xml): _De Abrahamo, De Iosepho, De Vita Mosis Lib. I, De Vita Mosis Lib. II, De Decalogo_ (1902) Ed. Leopold Cohn & Paul Wendland. Berlin: Berolini Reimer.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
